title: Hideo Kojima Plays Nintendo Switch - Kinda Funny Plays
description:
Death Stranding and Metal Gear Creator Hideo Kojima took Greg on in a game of 1-2-Switch at RTX Sydney. 

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!

Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/

transcript_chunks.text: what's up everybody I'm Greg Miller and this is hideo kajima we're about to do a let's play of one two switch to the shooting game or whatever and I'm going to smoke you you don't have a chance in hell it's over partner all right here you ready h I got him that's GRE that's Greg oh let's see your stats let's see your stats please please best yeah best of three best of [Music] three [Music] very give me a minute all right oh don't get ahead of [Music] yourself it's going to be close one woo bring me all your Legendary game developers and I will crush them mamoto are you here ladies and gentlemen what do you think of to O kajima and one two switch let us know in the comments below share the video with your friends and until next time no it's been our pleasure to serve you I'm sorry you had to die you had to die bring me them all
